exitPrompt_txt.text: Do you want to exit the game?

quiz_txtKeepQuizzing.text:
You still have light bulbs!
Do you want to keep quizzing?

txt_BuildingOffice.info: Adalen iti amin nga impormasyon panggep iti pinagtipid ti enerhiya idjay trabaho.

txt_BuildingHouse.info: Adalen iti amin nga impormasyon panggep iti pinagtipid ti enerhiya idjay balay.

txt_BuildingMall.info: Adalen iti amin nga impormasyon panggep iti pinagtipid ti enerhiya idjay mall ken establisemento.

txt_BuildingEconomic.info: Adalen iti amin nga impormasyon panggep iti pinagtipid ti enerhiya idjay sector iti pagsapulan.

txt_BuildingParking.info: Biruken jay Tan-oc iti Siudad ti Energia!

txt_BuildingEmbassy.info: Adalen amin nga maipanggep iti siudad ti Energia.

txt_BuildingGov.info: Ammuen dagiti patakaran iti gobyerno panggep iti pinagtipid ti enerhiya ken iti danum.

txt_BuildingSchool.info: Kitaen iti Wattmatters site ken adalen nu kasano iti pinagkalkular ti konsumo ti enerhiya idjay balay!

txt_BuildingPlaza.info: Padasen iti laing! Kumadua kadakami tapno lumawa iti sursuro panggep ti pinagtipid iti enerhiya!

txt_BuildingSeaport.info: Ammuen dagiti pakasaritaan iti LGU ken ana iti naaramidan da para iti enerhiya ken danum

txt_BuildingKnowledge.info: Ammuen dagiti patakaran iti gobyerno panggep iti pinagtipid ti enerhiya ken iti danum.

tutorial_1.header_info: Welcome to the City of Energia!
tutorial_1.info:
Learn all about the different energy and water practices that can be done whether at home or anywhere else!

We are your guides to this wonderful place.

tutorial_3.info: There are lots of places to explore in this city! Just tap the building to explore it.

tutorial_4.info: Each place has a lot of rooms and locations you can check out.

tutorial_5.info: If you ever get lost, feel free to press button below your left corner to call us.

tutorial_6.info: Have fun learning and exploring the City of Energia!

idle_1_gener.info: Lost? Just tap the icons, arrows, or buildings to explore them. You can always press the red button to exit back to the city.

idle_1_gia.info: Lost? Just tap the icons, arrows, or buildings to explore them. You can always press the red button to exit back to the city.

doe_reception_female.info: Welcome to the Department of Energy building.

doe_reception_male.info: Our public service are dignified and true.

txt_InteriorWattmatters.info: This is the Wattmatters site. Feel free to use it.

txt_InteriorQuestion.info:
You are currently exploring the [PANELINFO].
Use the                 to navigate the place. You can also press the icons to learn more about 

       Energy Efficiency                           Water Conservation

txt_InteriorParkingIntro.info: Adalen dagiti amin nga impormasyon panggep iti pinagusar iti enerhiya ken danom ti pinagbiyahe.

txt_InteriorParkingGarageSolar.info: Pinagusar iti solar powered lighting nga sistema tapno makissayan iti carbon footprint ken gasto iti kuryente.

txt_InteriorParkingGaragePlants.info: Iti pinagmula iti aglawlaw ket makatulong nga pakapsuten iti epekto ti climate change.

txt_InteriorParkingGasLighting.info: I-upgrade dagiti lighting fixtures, agusar iti light emitting diode wenno LED light bulbs nga natipid iti enerhiya ken nabaybayag iti sangapulo nga beses ngemti kadawyan nga bumbilya.

txt_InteriorParkingGreenTransportSolar.info: Pinagusar iti solar panels tapno makissayan iti carbon footprint ken makatulong nga agtipid iti kuarta.

txt_InteriorParkingGreenTransportCharger.info: Naibus ba iti bateryan? Daytoy nga Solar-powered charging stations ket maka charge ti adu nga mobile devices iti basbassit nga konsumo iti enerhiya.

txt_InteriorParkingGreenTransportWaiting.info: Makatulong iti mula ti aglawlaw iti lugar pagurayan nga mangkissay iti carbon emissions ken mangpabassit iti polusyon ti angin bayat ti pinag ururay iti sumaruno nga lugan.

txt_InteriorParkingSolarLighting.info: Naragsak nga isasangpet idtoy solar charging station iti siudad. Adda iti ordinansa iti Energia nga mangital-o iti pinagusar ti e-vehicles idjay pampubliko ken pribado nga sektor. Gapo kadetoy, solar energy nga adda iti aglawlaw iti mausar tapno maicharge dagiti EVs iti tulong ti solar charging stations.

txt_InteriorParkingSolarCharging.info: Iti pinagusar ti de-kuryente nga lugan (EVs) ket makatulong tapno bumaba iti riribuk ti suplay iti gasulina ken maagapan iti climate change.

txt_InteriorParkingSolarSolar.info: Iti pinagusar iti solar panels ket makatulong nga makissayan iti carbon footprint ken makatulong nga makatipid iti kuarta. Iti pinagusar iti solar energy ket makatulong pay nga maalagaan iti aglawlaw.

txt_InteriorParkingTransportWaiting.info: Makatulong iti mula ti aglawlaw iti lugar pagurayan nga mangkissay iti carbon emissions ken mangpabassit iti polusyon ti angin bayat ti pinag ururay iti sumaruno nga lugan.

txt_InteriorEmbassyIntro.info: Daytoy nga energy efficiency virtual showroom ket naaramid iti tulong iti America idjay United States Agency for International Development (USAID). Iti linaon na ket ti responsibilidad iti Department of Energy iti Pilipinas ken RTI International, ken haan nga kasapulan nga isut kita iti USAID wenno United States Government.

txt_InteriorGovernmentIntro.header: Naragsak nga isasangpet ditoy Department of Energy

txt_InteriorGovernmentLibraryLighting.info: I-upgrade dagiti lighting fixtures, agusar iti light emitting diode wenno LED light bulbs nga natipid iti enerhiya ken nabaybayag iti sangapulo nga beses ngemti kadawyan nga bumbilya.

txt_InteriorGovernmentOfficeLighting.info: I-upgrade dagiti lighting fixtures, agusar iti light emitting diode wenno LED light bulbs nga natipid iti enerhiya ken nabaybayag iti sangapulo nga beses ngemti kadawyan nga bumbilya.

txt_InteriorMallIntro.info: Adda tay ditoy tapno agadal panggep iti pinagtipid iti kuryente iti paglakwan.

txt_InteriorMallCentralLighting.info: Energy efficient malls take advantage of the natural light during daytime to reduce operational costs and electricity consumption.

txt_InteriorMallCentralAir.info: Aside from shopping, Filipinos go to malls to enjoy its cool and relaxing temperature. Cooling units of commercial establishments should be professionally serviced at least once a year to ensure its efficient performance.

txt_InteriorMallCentralWindow.info: Dagiti tawa ket makaited iti natural nga silaw. Daytoy natural nga silaw ket haan laeng nga makatipid iti enerhiya, perpekto pay para iti selfie!

txt_InteriorMallDisplayLighting.info: I-upgrade dagiti lighting fixtures, agusar iti light emitting diode wenno LED light bulbs nga natipid iti enerhiya ken nabaybayag iti sangapulo nga beses ngemti kadawyan nga bumbilya

txt_InteriorMallDisplayWindow.info: Ususaren dagiti mall iti natural nga silaw tapno makatipid iti enerhiya ken tapno makissayan iti gastos iti pagpatpataray ken pagkonsumo iti kuryente.

txt_InteriorMallFoodCourtLighting.info: I-upgrade dagiti lighting fixtures, agusar iti light emitting diode wenno LED light bulbs nga natipid iti enerhiya ken nabaybayag iti sangapulo nga beses ngemti kadawyan nga bumbilya.

txt_InteriorMallFoodCourtWindows.info: Dagiti tawa ket makaited iti natural nga silaw. Daytoy natural nga silaw ket haan laeng nga makatipid iti enerhiya, perpekto pay para iti selfie!

txt_InteriorMallFoodCourtWater.info: Dagiti danum nga naggapo iti paginum ket mabalin nga usaren ulit iti para kasilya.

txt_InteriorMallFoodCourtFoodStall.info: Dagiti induction stoves ket 90% nga naimimbag iti enerhiya ngem iti sabali nga klase iti paglutwan.

txt_InteriorMallFoodCourtDirtyDishes.info: Nu ag-ugugas ka iti pinggan ket patayen iti danum nu madi ususaren

txt_InteriorMallBathroomLighting.info: Agus usar dagiti silaw diay banyo iti motion detector tapnu makissayan iti konsumo ti kuryente.

txt_InteriorMallBathroomFaucet.info: Agus usar dagitoy nga gripo iti motion detector tapno makatipid idi danum.

txt_InteriorHouseLivingLight.info:
Light Emitting Diode or LED light bulbs last longer than other types of lighting. Plus, it saves as much as 50% of electricity consumption.

So, switch to LED!

txt_InteriorHouseLivingElectric.info: Clean your fans regularly. Dust and dirt can reduce the wind flow generated by fans.

txt_InteriorHouseLivingTelevision.info: Dalusan nga nasiyaat dagiti bentilador. Makissayan iti rugit ken tapok diay angin nga maar aramid iti bentilador.

txt_InteriorHouseLivingExtension.info:
Unplug extension cord when not in use to avoid phantom loading.

Phantom loading is like a leaky faucet. These are usually plugged appliances that you think are turned off, but still consuming electricity.

txt_InteriorHouseBedroomLighting.info: Light Emitting Diodes (LED) light bulbs last longer than other types of lighting. Plus, it saves as much as 50% of electricity consumption.

txt_InteriorHouseBedroomPlants.info: Indoor plants reduce heat and act as natural humidifiers. No wonder why plantitas and plantitos have plants inside their bedrooms too.

txt_InteriorHouseBedroomAircon.info:
Did you know that cleaning the filters and condensers of air conditioning units can save 100 pesos monthly?

So, make sure to maintain your ACs.

txt_InteriorHouseBedroomCharger.info: Never leave your devices charging overnight as it consumes electricity when left plugged.

txt_InteriorHouseBedroomWindow.info: Install curtains or blinds on windows to reduce solar heat from outside.

txt_InteriorHouseBedroomDoor.info: Close all the windows and doors when the air conditioning unit is turned on to keep the cool air inside.

txt_InteriorHouseBathroomLighting.info: Do not forget to turn off the lights after using the bathroom.

txt_InteriorHouseBathroomFaucet.info: Did you know you could save at least 6 gallons of water per day when you turn off the faucet while scrubbing your hands with soap?

txt_InteriorHouseBathroomShower.info:
Which do you think could save more water? Taking a shower or taking a bath using a dipper and pail?

Taking shorter showers conserve more water and lower your utility costs

txt_InteriorHouseBathroomVentilation.info: Aside from doors and windows, installing exhaust fans in the bathroom will help in air circulation.

txt_InteriorHouseGardenWater.info: Try reusing some of the water from your bath in your garden.

txt_InteriorHouseKitchenWater.info: If you wash dishes, turn off the running water when not rinsing.

txt_InteriorHouseKitchenRef.info:
Chill!

Don't forget to defrost your refrigerators regularly. While other refrigerators are frost-free, old refrigerators and freezers need to be defrosted once in a while to work efficiently.

txt_InteriorHouseKitchenMicrowave.info: Did you know that using a microwave when reheating food consumes less time and electricity?

txt_InteriorHouseKitchenStove.info:
We can save energy by turning off the gas stove during the last minute of cooking.

Keep your heating appliances away from cooling appliances like your refrigerator.

txt_InteriorHouseKitchenPlant.info: Did you know that plants in your kitchen contribute to healthy air filtration? And they also sequester carbon which is one of the many ways to mitigate climate change.

txt_InteriorSchoolIntro.info: It is our goal to share our existing knowledge and best practices with hopes to achieve a ripple effect in the rest of the country.

txt_InteriorSchoolClassroomLighting.info: Choose energy efficient light bulbs such as light-emitting diode (LED) light bulbs.

txt_InteriorSchoolClassroomAircon.info: Set your air conditioning units to standard temperature point of 24°c to conserve energy.

txt_InteriorSchoolClassroomStair.info: Taking the stairs maintains your health and saves energy. So, take stairs if you are able.

txt_InteriorOfficeIntro.info: Through the implementation of a Green Building Code, our buildings are designed to reduce the use of energy with due regard to the cost effectiveness, building function, comfort, health, safety, and productivity of occupants. Just like your home, our offices are equipped with energy efficient technologies!

txt_InteriorOfficeConferenceLighting.info: Choose energy efficient light bulbs. You can replace existing bulbs with light-emitting diode (LED) lights.

txt_InteriorOfficeConferenceProjector.info: Before leaving the office, do not forget to switch off and unplug unnecessary appliances and devices.

txt_InteriorOfficeCubicleLighting.info: Choose energy efficient light bulbs. You can replace existing bulbs with light emitting diode (LED) lights.

txt_InteriorOfficeCubicleCentralAir.info: To make cooling more efficient, consider the size of the place before installing air conditioning units.

txt_InteriorOfficeCubicleWindow.info: Glass walls and doors bring natural light and reduces electricity consumption.

txt_InteriorOfficeCubicleComputers.info:
Off to a meeting?

Set your personal computers on Sleep Mode if you will be away for more than 15 minutes.

txt_InteriorOfficeCubicleCharger.info: Energy-efficient charging stations for mobile devices can provide value addition to all employees and help encourage them to be more conscious in using electricity efficiently.

txt_InteriorOfficeCubicleLarge.info: Only print your documents when necessary. Remember that choosing to read it on your phone or tablet will reduce your paper and electricity consumption.

txt_InteriorOfficeElevatorElevator.info: Take the stairs if you are going fewer than two floors up or down. It's good for your health too!

txt_InteriorOfficeElevatorWindow.info: Glass walls and doors bring natural light and reduces electricity consumption.

txt_InteriorOfficePantryFaucet.info: If you wash dishes by hand, turn off the running water when not rinsing.

txt_InteriorOfficePantryKettle.info: Coffee break with officemates? Boiling the kettle only once produces five or six beverages rather than six times individually.

txt_InteriorOfficePantryVentilation.info: Take advantage of the natural air flowing through the building by directing the air towards the ceiling vents and exterior doors.

txt_InteriorOfficePersonalLighting.info: Choose energy efficient light bulbs. You can replace existing bulbs with light-emitting diode (LED) lights.

txt_InteriorOfficePersonalCentralAir.info: Set your air conditioning units to standard temperature points of 24-25°C to conserve electricity.

txt_InteriorOfficePersonalWindow.info: During daytime, your office switches off artificial lights and uses natural light.

txt_InteriorOfficePersonalComputers.info: Don't forget to turn off your computer/laptop or hibernate/sleep your PC when not in use.

txt_InteriorOfficePersonalChargers.info: Unplug your charger once your device is on full battery.

txt_InteriorOfficePersonalExtension.info: Do not overload your extension cord by plugging in device beyond its capacity.

txt_InteriorOfficeReceptionLighting.info: During daytime, your office switches off artificial lights and uses natural light.

txt_InteriorOfficeReceptionAircon.info: Room size is important when choosing the right air conditioning unit for your workplace. Install the air conditioning unit in the coolest part of the room, if possible, on a shady side where maximum air circulation is available.

txt_InteriorOfficeReceptionWindow.info: Modern and energy efficient buildings take advantage of natural ighting to conserve electricity consumption.

txt_InteriorOfficeRestroomLighting.info: This restroom has automatic lighting controls specifically, occupancy sensors, which save energy by automatically turning the lights off when not in use.

txt_InteriorOfficeRestroomFaucet.info: Fix leaky faucets, toilets, appliances, and sprinklers. Leaks vary in amount, but they can account for a lot of wasted water over time.

txt_InteriorOfficeRestroomVentilation.info: Aside from windows and doors, installing exhaust fans in the comfort room will improve air circulation and avoid moisture.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneIntro.info: Welcome to the City of Energia Economic Zone. This part of the city will show you the energy efficiency in the industrial sector. Let's take the tour!

txt_InteriorEcoZoneEcoPartLighting.info: This light is solar powered! Solar panels installed on the roof store energy during daylight to illuminate the park at night.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneEcoPartWater.info:
Reuse water where applicable for watering plants and cleaning designated areas.

Example: Water from fountains can be reused for watering plants instead of just draining it.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneEcoPartVentilation.info: Openings facing the sky, street courtyard, or air well shall be considered as acceptable sources of natural lighting and ventilation.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneGarageParking.info: Enclosed parking garage ventilation system shall automatically detect contaminant levels by using supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA) of building management system (BMS).

txt_InteriorEcoZoneGarageCharging.info: Installing charging stations in the parking area is more accessible and convenient for recharging electric vehicles (EVs).

txt_InteriorEcoZoneGarageSolar.info: Using solar panels significantly reduces carbon footprint and helps save money.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneMechHubLighting.info: Make sure to use energy efficient lighting such as light emitting diode (LED) bulbs. This can both help save money on your monthly electricity bills and also help conserve our environment!

txt_InteriorEcoZoneMechHubVentilation.info: Adequate ventilation maintains the temperature, humidity, and energy consumption in industrial establishments.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneMechHubWindows.info: During daytime, switch off lights and maximize the use of sunlight, especially in offices with big surrounding windows - using blinds or curtains can help regulate temperature and sun exposure.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneOfficeLighting.info: Make sure to use energy efficient light such as fluorescent lamps, CFL lamps and LED lamps - this can both help save money on yourmonthly electricity bills and also help conserve the environment!

txt_InteriorEcoZoneOfficeCentralAir.info: Air conditioning maintenance should be set regularly to ensure that it's working properly at its best without wastage on electricity consumption.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneOfficeWindow.info: During daytime, switch off lights and maximize the use of sunlight, especially in offices with big surrounding windows -using blinds or curtains can help regulate temperature and sun exposure.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneOfficeComputers.info: Unplug electronic devices including computers when not in use. Make it a habit to unplug before leaving your work areas.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneOfficeCharger.info: Energy-efficient charging stations for mobile devices can provide value addition to all employees and help encourage them to be more conscious in using electricity efficiently.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneProcessHubLighting.info: Make sure to use energy efficient lighting such as light-emitting diode (LED) bulbs. This can both help save money on your monthly electricity bills and also help conserve our environment!

txt_InteriorEcoZoneProcessHubVentilation.info: Installing exhaust systems maintains the air quality of the factories by removing contaminated indoor air.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneProcessHubCooling.info: Electricity consumption of air conditioning systems can be significantly reduced by minimizing the heat from buildings through the use of cooling systems.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneProcessHubBoiling1.info: For generation of steam, use a boiler with an efficiency rating of 85% and above.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneProcessHubBoiling2.info: Hot water systems shall be equipped with effective automatic temperature controls.

txt_InteriorEcoZonePumpzoneVentilation.info: Use sustainable architecture and interior design to make sure there's proper ventilation in the processing hub.

txt_InteriorEcoZonePumpzoneSteam.info: Steam is more economical compared with electricity. Where steam is available, use steam to generate hot water instead of electricity.

txt_InteriorEcoZonePumpzoneGenerator.info: In the absence of steam, use a direct-fired hot water generator with an efficiency rating of 85% and above.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneWarehouseLighting.info: Make sure to use energy efficient lighting such as light-emitting diode (LED) bulbs. This can both help save money on your monthly electricity bills and also help conserve our environment!

txt_InteriorEcoZoneWarehouseVentilation.info: Use sustainable architecture and interior design to make sure there's proper ventilation in the processing hub.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneWastedDisposalWaterDi.info: Waste disposal systems should be implemented with processes in place. Designated crew in-charge must have regular monitoring and reporting on water quality and usage.

txt_InteriorEcoZoneWastedDisposalWaterTr.info: As part of the water treatment facility, all water should be treated carefully and be at an acceptable level of quality before disposal.

txt_InteriorPlazaIntro.info: You are here at the City Plaza. Let's take a break from our tour and play a game! How well do you know about energy efficiency?

txt_InteriorSeaportIntro.info:
Welcome to the Seaport, the gateway to Energia's partner cities and municipalities!

Energia and its sister local government units (LGUs) learn from each other by sharing energy efficiency best practices that are feasible and applicable to other LGUs.
Which LGU would you like to visit first?

txt_InteriorEnerhiyangAtinIntro.info:
Welcome to the Enerhiyang Atin, the gateway to Energia's partner cities and municipalities!

Energia and its sister local government units (LGUs) learn from each other by sharing energy efficiency best practices that are feasible and applicable to other LGUs.
Which LGU would you like to visit first?

txt_InteriorEnerhiyangAtinDeskAircon.info: According to Inter-Agency Energy Efficiency and Conservation Committee (IAEECC) No. 1 and No. 3, all government offices are directed to use energy efficient inverter-type air-conditioning units or similar equivalent technologies. Moreover, air conditioners in government offices should be set to standard temperature points of 24-25°C to conserve energy.

txt_InteriorEnerhiyangAtinDeskStairUse.info: Taking the stairs maintains your health and saves energy. So, take the stairs if you are able.

txt_InteriorEnerhiyangAtinDeskLighting.info: Upgrade lighting fixtures by using light emitting diode (LED) light bulbs which are energy efficient and can last 10 times longer than the usual bulbs.

txt_InteriorEnerhiyangAtinOfficeLighting.info: Upgrade lighting fixtures by using light emitting diode (LED) light bulbs which are energy efficient and can last 10 times longer than the usual bulbs.
